metadata.title: Burger King Elevation - SMS Conversation Flows

thread.message: my fries were cold. again. this is the 3rd time this month
ugh, 3 times is a pattern. which location is this happening at?
the one on main street in orlando
got it. around what time do you usually go? trying to figure out if it's a specific shift
usually around 7pm after work
this is going straight to Tom. you'll hear back within 7 days. seriously, thank you for not giving up on us ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
SOGGY FRIES ARE NOT FRIES THEYRE JUST SAD POTATO STICKS
lol sad potato sticks ğŸ˜­ ok but real talkâ€” which store did this to you?
the bk on westheimer in houston. every single time
noted. we're flagging this location specifically. Tom's gonna see this. expect to hear back within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
wayyy too much salt on the fries i literally cant eat them
ooof that's rough. do you remember which location?
um i think the one near the mall? in tampa
the one on dale mabry or the other one?
dale mabry yes
got it, dale mabry tampa. this is going to Tom directly. you'll hear from us within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
no salt on fries??? hello??? did someone forget how to season
lol seasoning is not optional!! which location forgot the basics?
downtown chicago on state street
flagged. Tom's seeing this one. expect a response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
bro the fry container was like half empty lmaooo u guys are scamming
half empty is not ok. which store is being stingy?
the one by ucf in orlando
was this a regular fry or a large?
large!! paid for large got a small basically
that's not right. sending this to Tom now. you'll hear back within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
fries tasted like old grease. actually made me nauseous
that's a health concernâ€” which location was this? we need to check their oil
brooklyn on flatbush ave
do you remember what day/time roughly?
saturday around 2pm
this is serious and we're taking it seriously. Tom will see this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
why are my fries burnt to a crisp this aint cajun style
cajun style ğŸ˜‚ we don't do that on purpose i promise. which store burned them?
phoenix on camelback road
noted. sending this to Tom. you'll get a response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
yall need curly fries. regular fries are mid. do better
curly fries huh? noted. is this a 'would be nice' or a 'dealbreaker i'm going to arby's' situation?
i mean i still come but i think about it every time lol
lol fair enough. passing this to Tomâ€” menu feedback goes straight to the top. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
burger was cold in the middle. do u guys even have heat lamps
cold burger = unacceptable. which location was this?
san diego, the one on el cajon blvd
got it. was this dine-in, drive-thru, or delivery?
drive thru
notedâ€” drive-thru at el cajon blvd san diego. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
the bun looked like someone sat on it. literally flat as a pancake
pancake bun is not the vibe. which store served you this?
miami, the one on biscayne
biscayne miami, noted. Tom's gonna see this. you'll hear back within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
meat was so dry i thought i was eating cardboard no joke
cardboard is not on the menu last i checked. which location?
atlanta on peachtree
was this a whopper or a different burger?
whopper. the flagship burger and it was trash
ouch. that hits different. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
uhhh the patty was PINK inside?? im scared to eat this
that's a food safety issueâ€” which store was this? we need to check this immediately
denver on colfax ave
do you still have the burger or a photo? totally understand if you tossed it
i took a pic before i threw it out. can i send it?
yes please send it
[sends photo]
got it. this is being escalated immediately. Tom will see this personally. response within 7 days but likely sooner ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
cheese wasnt even melted. just a cold square of sadness on my burger
cold square of sadness ğŸ’€ which store is serving unmelted cheese?
las vegas on the strip, the one near planet hollywood
strip location, noted. sending this to Tom. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘

extracted_data.location: the strip near planet hollywood, las vegas

thread.message: i said LIGHT mayo not SWIM IN MAYO. this is disgusting
mayo swimming pool is not what we're going for. which location drowned your burger?
dallas on greenville ave
greenville ave dallas, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
ASKED FOR MAYO. NO MAYO. HOW HARD IS THIS
not hard at all, we messed up. which store?
SEATTLE ON AURORA
was this in the app/receipt or did you ask verbally at the window?
IN THE APP. IT SAID MAYO. NO MAYO.
got itâ€” app order, aurora seattle. Tom's gonna see this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
i said NO pickles like 3 times and theres literally 6 pickles on here
6 pickles when you wanted 0 is impressive in the wrong way. which location?
the one in times square nyc
times square is chaos but that's not an excuse. was this verbal or in the app?
verbal, i said it at the counter AND at pickup
twice and still pickles. not ok. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
I specifically asked for extra pickles and got ZERO. None. Nada.
the opposite problem but equally frustrating. which store forgot your pickles?
portland on burnside
burnside portland, noted. this is going to Tom. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
the raw onion is so strong my breath is gonna kill someone
lol we don't want to be responsible for that. is this a 'too much onion' complaint or 'onion quality' complaint?
too much. like why is there a whole onion slice on there
got it. which location is heavy-handed with the onions?
austin on congress ave
congress ave austin, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
lettuce was brown and slimy. yall serving salad from last week?
brown lettuce is a freshness issue we take seriously. which location?
boston near fenway
do you remember what day this was?
yesterday, tuesday
tuesday fenway boston, noted. this is going directly to Tom. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
tomato was so watery it made the whole bun soggy. gross
soggy bun from watery tomatoâ€” which store was this?
philadelphia on market street
market street philly, noted. Tom's gonna see this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
got someone elses order. i dont even eat meat. this has 2 whoppers
oh no. vegetarian getting 2 whoppers is worst case scenario. which location mixed this up?
san francisco on market street
was this drive-thru, counter, or delivery?
drive thru. they didnt even check the name
market street sf drive-thru, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
missing nuggets, missing fries, missing drink. wtf did i pay for
so basically you got... a bag? which store gave you an empty experience?
detroit on woodward
do you have your receipt? want to make sure we know exactly what was missing
yeah i got it. 10pc nugget, large fry, large coke. got none of it
that's a complete fail. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
ordered a whopper got a chicken sandwich. NOT THE SAME THING
definitely not the same thing. which location made the swap?
minneapolis downtown
downtown minneapolis, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘

extracted_data.issue: wrong item - whopper vs chicken sandwich

thread.message: paid $2 extra for bacon. no bacon. this is literally theft
paying for bacon and not getting it is not ok. which store owes you bacon?
nashville on broadway
was this an app order or at the counter?
app. it literally says add bacon on my receipt
app order, broadway nashville, bacon missing. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
no napkins no ketchup no straw. just vibes i guess
just vibes ğŸ˜­ which location sent you off unprepared?
charlotte on tryon street
tryon street charlotte, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
u charged me twice for the same meal. fix this NOW
double charge is urgent. which location and do you have the receipts or bank statement showing both charges?
houston on westheimer. i have screenshots of my bank app showing 2 charges same amount same time
can you send those screenshots? we'll escalate this immediately
[sends screenshots]
got it. this is being escalated as a billing issue AND going to Tom. response within 7 days but billing should be faster ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
receipt says one thing bag says another. which one is the lie
neither should be lying tbh. which location has a communication problem?
the bk in newark airport
airports are hectic but that's not an excuse. what was different between receipt and bag?
receipt says whopper meal, bag had chicken sandwich and small fry
newark airport, whopper ordered, chicken received. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
drive thru took 25 mins. TWENTY FIVE. i could have cooked at home
25 min drive-thru is insane. which location kept you waiting?
los angeles on sunset blvd
was there a specific issue or just slow?
they said they were waiting on fries. for 25 minutes. fries.
25 min for fries on sunset. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
sat inside for 20 minutes watching employees do nothing
20 min watching nothing happen is frustrating. which location?
cleveland on euclid ave
was it busy or were you the only one waiting?
like 3 other people waiting too. nobody was helping anyone
euclid ave cleveland, multiple people waiting, no service. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
they told me to park and wait. waited 15 min. had to go back in line
parking purgatory is the worst. which location forgot about you?
pittsburgh in oakland
oakland pittsburgh, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
app said ready for pickup. it was not ready. i waited 12 more min
app lying to you is a tech problem we need to fix. which location?
indianapolis on meridian
is this the first time or does this location do this regularly?
happened twice now at the same place
meridian indianapolis, repeat app timing issue. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
delivery took over an hour. food was freezing. thanks for nothing
hour+ delivery with cold food is a fail. which location was the order from?
kansas city on main
was this through our app or a delivery service like doordash?
doordash but the restaurant took forever according to the driver
main street kansas city, doordash delay on restaurant side. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
doordash driver said bk took forever. my food was ice cold
when the driver is calling us out, we messed up. which location?
baltimore inner harbor
inner harbor baltimore, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
employees were literally having a full conversation ignoring customers
that's not ok. which location was prioritizing chat over customers?
st louis on grand
roughly what time was this?
like 1pm. lunch rush and they were just talking
grand st louis, 1pm lunch rush, staff ignoring customers. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
had to yell HELLO 3 times before anyone acknowledged me at counter
you should never have to yell for service. which location?
milwaukee on water street
water street milwaukee, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
the girl at the register rolled her eyes at me. ROLLED HER EYES. i want her name
eye rolling is unacceptable. which location? and do you remember what she looked like or any name tag?
phoenix on indian school rd. brunette, young, no name tag visible
what time roughly? we can check who was on register
around 6pm yesterday
indian school rd phoenix, 6pm, brunette at register. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
asked for a refund and the manager laughed at me. LAUGHED. im calling corporate
a manager laughing at a refund request is completely unacceptable. which location and do you remember the manager's name?
sacramento on j street. didnt catch his name but he was the only manager there. older guy
j street sacramento, manager laughed at refund request. this is a serious complaint. Tom's seeing this personally. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
employee told me to chill out when i asked where my food was. EXCUSE ME??
telling a customer to chill out is not how we do things. which location?
tucson on speedway
do you remember who said it? name tag or description?
guy at the window. had a beard. no name tag
speedway tucson, bearded employee at window. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
cashier was on her phone the ENTIRE time taking my order. didnt even look at me once
phone during service is not ok. which location?
albuquerque on central
central albuquerque, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
i asked for extra sauce and he said no. just NO. not we're out. just no. wtf
just 'no' with no explanation? which location?
new orleans on canal street
what sauce were you asking for?
zesty sauce. he literally just said no and moved to the next person
canal street new orleans, refused extra zesty sauce. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘

extracted_data.issue: refused extra sauce with no explanation

thread.message: manager said its not his problem that my order was wrong. NOT HIS PROBLEM. then whose??
that is literally a manager's problem. which location and do you remember his name?
memphis on union ave. name was marcus or something
union ave memphis, manager possibly named marcus. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘

extracted_data.issue: manager refused responsibility for wrong order

thread.message: the way ur staff talks to customers is DISGUSTING. never coming back
we're sorry. can you tell us which location and what happened?
louisville on bardstown rd. the whole crew was rude from start to finish. eye rolls, sighing, attitude
bardstown rd louisville, overall crew attitude issue. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
lady at window threw the bag at me. literally THREW it. i have it on dashcam
threw it?? which location? and if you're comfortable sharing that dashcam clip, please do
oklahoma city on reno ave. let me get the clip
[sends video]
video received. reno ave okc. this is being escalated immediately. Tom's seeing this personally. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
asked to speak to manager. employee said HE IS THE MANAGER. with that attitude??
a manager with attitude is a bigger problem. which location?
tulsa on 71st street
do you remember his name?
jamal or something like that. had a manager name tag
71st street tulsa, manager named jamal. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
ur employee called me stupid under his breath. i heard it. i want him FIRED
that is absolutely unacceptable. which location and any details about who said it?
omaha on dodge street. young guy, blond, at the register
what time was this?
around 7:30pm
dodge street omaha, 7:30pm, blond male register. calling a customer stupid is a serious offense. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
complained about cold food and they just shrugged. SHRUGGED. thats the response??
a shrug is not a response. which location?
wichita on kellogg
kellogg wichita, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
been a customer for 15 years and this is how u treat me?? done. absolutely done
15 years of loyalty matters. please tell us what happened and where
cincinnati on vine street. ordered my usual and they messed it up, asked for a remake, cashier rolled her eyes and slammed the new bag on the counter
vine street cincinnati, 15 year customer, eye roll and slamming. Tom needs to see this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘

extracted_data.issue: eye roll and bag slamming when asked for remake

thread.message: employee mocked my accent when i ordered. thats DISCRIMINATION and i will sue
mocking anyone's accent is discrimination and completely unacceptable. which location and any details you can share?
el paso on montana ave. it was the guy taking orders. repeated my order back in a fake accent and the other employees laughed
we are so sorry. do you remember the time or what he looked like?
saturday around noon. hispanic guy with glasses
montana ave el paso, saturday noon, employee with glasses mocked accent. this is a discrimination complaint and is being treated as such. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
asked for a replacement burger and they acted like i was asking for a kidney
replacing a wrong order should be easy. which location made it hard?
fresno on blackstone
blackstone fresno, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
THE DISRESPECT at the downtown location is unreal. who trains these people
which downtown? and what happened?
downtown denver. the whole vibe is rude. this time they literally ignored me for 5 minutes while chatting, then had attitude when i asked to order
downtown denver, ignored then attitude. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
ur staff needs customer service training ASAP. this is embarassing for a major brand
which location needs training? and what happened?
san antonio on broadway. the cashier literally sighed when i asked a question about the menu
broadway san antonio, cashier sighed at menu question. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
i was polite and ur cashier had an attitude from second one. FOR WHAT
you shouldn't get attitude for being polite. which location?
jacksonville on beach blvd
beach blvd jacksonville, noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
manager told me to leave when i asked for corporate number. kicked out for asking a question??
asking for corporate is your right. which location kicked you out?
columbus on high street. i just asked for a number to complain and he said if i dont like it i can leave
high street columbus, manager told customer to leave for asking for corporate number. this is serious. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘

extracted_data.issue: told customer to leave for asking for corporate number

thread.message: drive thru guy was screaming into the speaker. WHY ARE U YELLING AT ME BRO
screaming into the speaker is wild. which location?
raleigh on capital blvd
capital blvd raleigh, screaming at drive-thru. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
employee sneered at me when i used a coupon. sorry for using ur own promotions??
coupons exist to be used. which location has a problem with that?
richmond on broad street
broad street richmond, sneered at coupon use. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
bathroom looked like a crime scene. im not exaggerating
crime scene is alarming. which location?
newark on market street
do you have photos? no pressure if you didnt want to document that
i do actually. its bad
photos received. market street newark bathroom. this is being escalated. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
tables were sticky. had to wipe with my own napkins. disgusting
sticky tables = not cleaned. which location?
jersey city on kennedy blvd
kennedy blvd jersey city, cleanliness issue. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
floor was so sticky my shoes made sounds walking
sticky floor is a slip hazard too. which location?
buffalo on delaware ave
delaware ave buffalo, sticky floor. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
whole restaurant smelled weird. like old mop water
mop water smell is not appetizing. which location?
rochester on east main
east main rochester, smell issue. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
AC broken in the middle of summer. it was like eating in a sauna
sauna dining is not the experience we want. which location?
tampa on dale mabry
was this recent? want to make sure its flagged as urgent if its still broken
yesterday
dale mabry tampa, AC broken as of yesterday. Tom's seeing this and flagging as urgent. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
tried to sit down and the chair was literally broken
broken furniture is a safety issue. which location?
orlando on colonial
colonial orlando, broken chair. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
soda machine was empty. ice machine was empty. why am i here
valid question. which location has nothing to drink?
fort lauderdale on sunrise blvd
sunrise blvd fort lauderdale, empty machines. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
app crashes every time i try to checkout. FIX YOUR APP
app crashing is frustrating. are you on iphone or android? and what version?
iphone 14 latest ios
got it. does it crash at a specific step or random?
always when i hit pay. every single time
iphone 14, crashes at payment. this is going to Tom AND our tech team. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
coupon code didnt work. expired yesterday. thats predatory
expired by a day is frustrating. which coupon was it?
the $5 whopper meal one. literally tried at 12:01am and it was already dead
notedâ€” coupon expiration timing feedback. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
QR code wouldnt scan. employee didnt know what to do. chaos
QR chaos is a training issue. which location?
miami beach on collins
collins miami beach, QR scanning issue. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘

extracted_data.issue: QR code wouldn't scan, staff untrained

thread.message: mobile order disappeared. no one could find it. had to reorder
disappearing orders are a system problem. which location and do you have the order confirmation?
chicago on michigan ave. yeah i have the confirmation email
can you send a screenshot? we'll track down what happened
[sends screenshot]
got it. michigan ave chicago, order disappeared. Tom's seeing this and so is tech team. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
wheres my crown points?? i spent $40 last week and got nothing
missing points is annoying. do you remember which location and was this through the app?
yes through the app. brooklyn on fulton street
can you check if the receipt shows your rewards account was linked?
it says member but no points showed up
fulton street brooklyn, app order, rewards linked but no points. Tom's seeing this + loyalty team. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
why did u discontinue the chicken fries they were the only reason i came
chicken fries have passionate fans. is this a 'bring them back' vote or a 'goodbye forever' message?
BRING THEM BACK. i will literally go weekly if you do
notedâ€” chicken fries demand logged. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
breakfast ends at 10:30?? its 10:32. ur telling me the eggs evaporated?
lol eggs dont evaporate but the cutoff is rough. is this a 'please extend breakfast' request?
YES extend it to at least 11. who eats breakfast at 10:30 anyway
breakfast hours feedback logged. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
whopper costs more than big mac and its not even better. explain
spicy take. is this a price complaint or a quality complaint?
both tbh. if youre gonna charge more it should BE more
price vs quality feedback noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
why is the ice cream machine always working at mcdonalds but ur shakes r always broken
the shake machine question. which location always has broken shakes?
honestly? most of them. but specifically atlanta on ponce
ponce atlanta, shake machine. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
ur impossible whopper gave me the worst stomach ache of my life
sorry to hear that. which location? and do you have any food allergies we should note?
no allergies. new york on 34th street. maybe it was sitting too long?
34th street nyc, impossible whopper stomach issue. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
the crowns on the kids meal are cheap garbage. my kid cried
a crying kid over a broken crown is not the goal. which location and what happened to the crown?
it ripped the second she put it on. houston on kirby
kirby houston, kids crown quality issue. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
why cant i get a whopper with big mac sauce. cowards
lol we have our own sauces. is this a 'create a new signature sauce' suggestion?
yes actually. something that competes. stacker sauce was close but its gone
sauce innovation feedback noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
yall got rid of the satisfries and i will NEVER forgive u
satisfries had fans. is this an official bring-them-back vote?
YES. healthier option that actually tasted good. why would you kill that
satisfries demand logged. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
bring back the angry whopper or i swear ill go to wendys forever
angry whopper ultimatum received. noted as a formal menu request
good. that jalapeÃ±o situation was perfect
angry whopper demand logged. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
why is there no spicy option for anything. this menu is for babies
menu for babies ğŸ˜‚ fair point. what would you want to see spicy?
spicy chicken sandwich that actually has heat. spicy whopper. spicy fries. ANYTHING
spicy menu expansion feedback noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
i rember when whoper was $2 now its $8??? ur JOKING right
inflation is real. is this about the base price or the meal price?
both! its crazy. i used to get 2 whoppers for what 1 costs now
pricing feedback noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
menu is confusing af. too many options. i just want food not a puzzle
menu simplification feedback. is it the physical menu board or the app thats confusing?
the board in store. too many combos and numbers. just tell me what to eat
in-store menu clarity feedback noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
Y DO U EVEN HAVE FISH SANDWICH NOONE ORDERS THAT
fish sandwich has a small but loyal fanbase. is this a 'get rid of it' vote or a 'make it better' vote?
GET RID OF IT and use the space for something good
fish sandwich removal vote logged. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
ur commercials r cringe. fire whoever makes them plz
marketing feedback received lol. any specific commercial that made you text us?
the one with the singing. you know the one. horrible
commercial feedback noted. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
the bk lounge near me closes at 9pm thats not even late
9pm is early. which location closes too soon?
austin on lamar. its a college area and closes at 9?? make it make sense
lamar austin, hours too early for college area. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
wifi in store doesnt work. false advertising
wifi that doesnt work is annoying. which location?
seattle on pike street
pike street seattle, wifi not working. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
told employee it was my bday. didnt even say happy birthday. wow
happy belated birthday from us at least ğŸ‚ which location missed the moment?
haha thanks. it was the one in denver on 16th street
16th street denver, birthday not acknowledged. Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
im writing this from the toilet. thanks alot burger king ğŸ’€
oh no ğŸ˜­ which location and what did you eat?
double whopper from the bk on sunset in LA. something was off
how long ago did you eat it? this could be a food safety issue
like 2 hours ago. im still here ğŸ’€
sunset LA, double whopper, possible food issue. feel better and please let us know if it gets worse. Tom's seeing this as a priority. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘

ask_location: which store did this to you?
ask_time: do you remember what day/time roughly?
ask_employee: do you remember who said it? name tag or description?
any details about who said it?
do you remember the manager's name?
do you remember what she looked like or any name tag?
ask_photo: do you still have the burger or a photo?
if you're comfortable sharing that clip, please do
response_templates.final_standard: Tom's seeing this. response within 7 days ğŸ”ğŸ‘‘
